title: Firefox 90 does not load properly specific web pages and services (gmail, youtube, reCAPTCHA, etc.)
content:
Two weeks ago my browser updated itself to version 90. Before that everything was OK.

After that..... Firts of all in Google Chrome everything works just fine. In Firefox - most of the time after a google search if I click on one of the results nothing happens. If I open it in a new tab or window, I got a blank page. - I cannot log into my gmail account. I can get to the page where I can type in my account name, but then I get an error message before the web page'd ask fore my psw. - youtube does not load properly. If then I click on the youtube icon on the left top corner then it trys to load the page again, and after some time it says I have no internet connection. - google translate does not answer, - reCAPTCHAs don't work. The browser could not load them, or if it loads something then it won't work. Etc.

Again: everiyhing was OK before the version 90 update. I was on a 2 weeks vacation, just got back, but all the same, they don't work.

I tried everything - cleared the history, cache, etc., - checking the firewall, - proxy (I don't use any proxy), - ipv6 - made a new profile - troubleshooting mode (disabeling addons and themes), everything. Nothing helped.

I use Win10. And it synced the firefox profile to an other win10 PC, where I got exactly the same problems.

This is my last step before after 20+ years of using firefox switching to chrome.
creator: imkere

title: Informar URL de imagem personalizada na tela inicial
content:
Prezados(as).

Na tela inicial existe a possibilidade de informar um atalho para cada um dos ícones. Nas imagens que enviei, estou tentando fazer o ícone do Banco do Brasil aparecer no botão, porém somente aparece a letra B, conforme "1-Letras.png". Ao clicar nos três pontos e editar, após informar URL e clicar em visualizar, a logo do BB aparece, conforme "2-Visualizar.png", após clicar em salvar, o botão fica branco, conforme "3-EmBranco.png". No caso do Disney+, a logo aparece sem a necessidade de informar URL, conforme "4-Disney.png". Solicito orientação.

Obrigado.
creator: AntonioPC

title: Quando uso Firefox da alcuni giorni (e solo con Firefox) ed entro in un qualsiasi siti web il monitor, il video, traballa, sfarfalla per 3/4 secondi
content: Buongiorno, da alcuni giorni quando uso Firefox (e solo con Firefox, con altri browser non accade nulla , è tutto normale) se entro in qualsiasi sito web il video, il monitor traballa, sfarfalla per 3/4 secondi poi tutto procede regolarmente. Cambio pagina e traballa, sfarfalla ancora per altri 4/5 secondi. Con al browser tipo Crhome, Opera, Microsot Edge non succede, è tutto regolare). Forse perchè sul mio vecchio PC (che però è ancora discretamente rapido, non mi crea nessun altro problema se non lentezza ad accendersi e a spegnersi, ma nulla di più) è installato ancora WINDOWS XP PROFESSIONAL 64 BIT e magari alcuni aggiornamenti fatti ultimamente da Firefox hanno creato questo piccolo inconveniente al mio monitor ? C'è forse qualche soluzione per impedire questo sfarfallio del video/monitor quando uso Firefox ? Grazie - Davide
creator: dvdblu97

title: Secure connection failed
content:
First let me say I understand there is no workaround for this problem. However there should be. I don't know why this website won't load, that's not my job. I installed an app over a year ago and have not had a single problem, other than having to reset my password 6 to 8 months ago. Which happened no problem.


But when I tried to reset my password this time, they sent me a reset email, I clicked the link in the email, and get this error message, now as I told someone else a couple days ago, this is my machine, if I want to take the chance of going to a website, then you have no business telling me I can't. I am a grown man, I can make that choice for myself. Especially when I know the site is safe. So you need to find a way to put a "Ignore warnings and proceed anyway" button on this error page.

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to sctrack.sendcloud.net. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

This is the link I'm trying to access

https://sctrack.sendcloud.net/

BTW: Yall must be some stupid people, the last line of the error msg says "contact the website owners", how the hell am I supposed to do that when you have me blocked out???????? Use your critical thinking skills. Instead of telling me to do something you just told me you won't let me do. Put a damn bypass button on this, I really need to get this password reset.
creator: 1971robby

title: Closed Caption missing
content:
I have been trying to watch the video linked below with Closed Captions, but they won't appear. I tried opening it on other browsers, such as Opera GX, and it works just fine. I tried turning CC off and back on and reloading the page, it doesn't work. Please help.

creator: gabsc.db

title: Bookmarks restored outside any folders
content:
I restored my bookmarks from a few days ago via one of the day-by-day automatically-created backups (in the folder Profiles\...\bookmarkbackups).

The problem lies in the fact that the bookmarks were restored outside the folders in which they were catalogued. Specifically, the folders have been restored but are empty; all bookmarks are listed in the Bookmarks Menu, after the empty folders.

Is there any way to get the bookmarks back into the folders, or am I forced to do it by hand?


Thanks in advance for any suggestions.

PS: I use Firefox 90.0 on Windows 10.
creator: madera.alfonso

title: Quiero recuperar mis marcadores y contraseñas
content:
Hola,

He formateado mi laptop, habiendo sincronizado antes de hacerlo. Cuando volví a instalar Mozilla, inicié sesión y mi antigua configuración no se sincronizó. ¿Hay alguna forma de recuperar toda mi información, sobre todo los marcadores?

Gracias.
creator: draouch42
